alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 10:19PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts possible closer to the higher terrain. * WHERE...The southern I-25 Corridor, including Walsenburg and Trinidad. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, with hazardous travel conditions expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
